title: cant lvl up on league of legends
body: hey cancer riot when are u finnaly gonna fix these fking bots in customs i legit cant even lvl up cause these bots only feeds and theres usualy 3 each fking game Fix ur fcking r%%%%%ed game so i can atelast lvl the fcuk up thx

replies.body: Oh man, I feel you there. It wasn't too long ago when I was getting stuck with bots match after match, and it's really shitty to say the least. Make sure that you're reporting them in the post game lobby, and our agents should be able to take care of the rest!
OR ATLEAST BAN THESE FKING CANCEROUS FKING BOTS PLZ FOR ONCE IN UR LIVE RIOT DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS
